story.text:
YOUTUBE USf1zRaDyH4
MacArthur Park at The Sage, Gateshead
These guys are one of the best.  It's a close call between them and Black Dyke.  Seen them both in concert numerous times over the years, jaw-dropping stuff.
As a - reasonably good - cornet player myself, I watch them and think "that's impossible" !
What I particularly like about this video, the conductor looks to be enjoying himself every bit as much as the players !
This is what music is all about - pure enjoyment.
To those of you that have never played in front of an appreciative audience, and got high on the adrenaline rush - you're missing something special :-)﻿ -- Arthur Wheeler
